step.title: How to
Welcome to the Fever Diagnostic Wizard
step.description: During next steps you'll be asked to insert informations about your patient and his health state. When you finish the insertion in each step, you've to click "Next" button. During the procedure, each action is reversible (by clicking "Back" button). Only when you'll click "Finish" button in the last step, your changhes will be stored and sended to the remote server.
